phrases: Nobu-chan received her acceptance notice from the undergraduate university in Hokkaido,
Otani, who wants to become a teacher,
I do not like studying or taking tests,
What do you want to do about the next Umibouzu concert?
I am going to pass this time.
This is Umibouzu we are talking about!
It is the last Umibouzu concert of the year!
But I do not really have a choice.
This is the only time I have to study for exams.
I was choking back tears when I finally decided not to go.
Who was it who said she was going to support me?!
Exam students sure have it hard.
If not, stop talking to me while I am trying to memorize English vocabulary.
Why are you following me, anyway?
No need to put it like that.
I have got a reason for coming this way.
It is at the restaurant opposite your prep school.
Why are you working all of a sudden?
This way I can at least walk you halfway home.
Your ribbon is not on straight.
And your nails are too long.
Please cut them before you come tomorrow.
And tie your hair up tighter.
And this is the second day in a row.
I was held back at school by my teacher.
I already told you to call ahead if that happens.
And it is the limited edition one that you can only get at his concerts!
Do not tell me you are a huge Umibouzu fan too?
It is awesome to have another Umibouzu fan around!
I am feeling all excited now!
So what is this younger co-worker of yours like?
His face is kind of cute,
Is your midget fetish speaking to you?
Who is got a midget fetish?!
Come to think of it, Otani-kun seems to be working really hard.
I heard he stayed behind yesterday,
At this rate, getting into college will not be impossible for him.
Maybe I should just start doing this full time...
You should not always make such a fuss.
And I was thinking of doing this full time?
I think it needs more salt.
It was too sweet, was it?
I do not get this part.
Wh-What is up with all of you?!
It is like you are all ready to fly off into the future!
Maybe I should add yams to the recipe.
You will definitely become a great artisan.
I will get yelled at again.
What did you come here for?!
What did you come here for to your customers?
Did you come here just to laugh at me?
Please let me know what you would like to order.
I am a customer, you know.
I am going to prep class in a bit.
They even hold them on Sundays?
There are no weekends for exam students.
Especially not for the ones with bad grades.
Say Risa, where is that cute guy you mentioned last time?
Does not look like he is here today.
I told you it is not like that!
So that guy is short too?
He is a huge Umibouzu fan.
I will get yelled at if I keep talking.
She seems a lot happier than I expected.
You said you came to laugh at her,
Since she was down about always getting chewed out.
It is not like that, you idiots!
An exam student's got no time to worry about others.
If you are like that, Risa will hook up with that cute short kid behind your back.
So Otani has class on Sundays too?
I was planning to go out with him next Sunday since I will have the day off.
What is with this odd, gloomy atmosphere?
We heard he did terribly in the practice exams.
The results for his top choice school were all C's.
I even sacrificed sleep for study...
Well, even if you start studying now, you cannot expect your grades to go up right away.
You have still got time, so do not worry.
That is easy for you to say.
You will wear yourself out at this rate.
This has nothing to do with anything like that!
Stop blurting out whatever comes into your head!
I would have done that without you telling me.
Am I getting in his way?
I know he is under a lot of stress, but could not he have been a little nice?
We are on together again today!
I cut myself just now when I was sharpening the knives.
I was wondering what to do about it...
I break glasses and cut my hands all the time,
Old lady Matsumara helped me at first,
She will get angry if she hears you calling her an old lady.
She is not here, is she?
You are really funny and kind.
I have been working here for six months, but this is the first time I have met someone like you.
Even in the kitchen, you are famous.
We can alway hear you shouting from outside.
Like, Whoops! or, I am so sorry!
I get yelled at by old lady Matsumara for shouting loudly like that too...
I called her old lady again.
She is definitely not around, right?
Well, I am feeling better now, at any rate.
I was right to bring my umbrella.
You have still got time, so do not worry.
This way I can at least walk you halfway home.
She... probably did not bring an umbrella.
Matsumara-san, is everything on our menu available to go?
And if you do not memorize the entire menu tonight, I am not letting you go home.
Well, there sure is a lot of text...
I am getting sleepy just looking at it.
You make mistakes because you do not know the menu!
I have memorized all of the noodle dishes perfectly!
So all of these menu items can also be to go...
Maybe I should get something for Otani to have for dinner...
If I bring him dinner, Otani will probably be surprised.
I w-was not... th-that... uh... th-this...
It is not what you think, Otani.
So that was who Nobu-chan was talking about?
She cheated on me with that midget she works with.
I told you, you got it all wrong!
So you only wanted me for my body?
So it does not matter who it is, as long as he is short?
Who would deliberately look for a boyfriend shorter then herself?
No matter how busy Otani was with his exams...
I never thought you would two-time him!
I did not think you were like, Risa!
Will you just listen to me?!
I am telling you, there is absolutely nothing going on.
That is what you say, but he went and did something like that...
I do not know, even if you ask me.
But we would already finished work...
And if I would stayed to chat, I would have been yelled at.
Honestly, I am not two-timing you.
Next time he tries to lay a hand on you,
Maybe you should not punch him in the nose...
I should have hit him when I had the chance.
Seeing him this upset over me makes me kind of happy.
This is no laughing matter, idiot.
It was a moment of weakness, and by the time I realized...
I was asleep anyway, so I do not remember a thing.
Only fifty people get to go.
And I would like to invite you.
Even if it is just this once...
I would really like to go with you, Koizumi-san.
I will not do anything that will make trouble for you!
You do not want to come?
Taking everything into consideration it is obvious that I should not...
Even if I am not interested in him, going to a concert with him after what happened is...
There is no excuse this time.
So... it is a no, then?
I am the world's biggest idiot!
I could not say no to him!
We are just going to a concert.
I will hurry there and then hurry on home once it is finished.
See you again at Osaka Castle Hall next year!
That ends our broadcast of the Umibouzu concert.
She was at work, so she will definitely be happy when I give this to her.
It was an invite-only concert, after all.
A once in a lifetime thing!
That was my first time seeing Umibouzu perform before such a small audience.
Thank you for inviting me to such a great event.
I am glad I finally asked you out.
I am asking you what you are doing!
It is not what you think!
I was the one who pressured her into going to the Umibouzu concert with me.
Koizumi-san did not do anything wrong!
So the two of you went to a concert together?
I was the one who really wanted to go to the concert.
I am the one who is in the wrong, so if you really want to break someone is nose, break mine.
I am breaking up with you.
I cannot go out with someone like you anymore!
Do not say you are going to break up with me.
Do what you want with that midget, Koizumi.
